name: code-bing
description: Extension to search for selected text in the internet.

codebing.searchProviders.title: Search providers
codebing.searchProviders.description: A dictionary with search engines, mapping a key to a search url. In the search url {query} is replaced with the user search. Use the key as first word in the search input to specify the search engine.

^\\S+$.title: Key to search url mapping
^\\S+$.description: A key mapping to a search url. '{query}' is replaced with the search query.

codebing.useDefaultProviderOnly.title: Use default search provider only.
codebing.useDefaultProviderOnly.description: If true, only the default search provider will be used.

codebing.defaultProvider.title: Default search provider
codebing.defaultProvider.description: A string containing a search engine (or key from searchProviders). In the search url {query} is replaced with the user search.

codebing.noInputBoxIfTextSelected.title: No input box if text is selected
codebing.noInputBoxIfTextSelected.description: If this is 'true' no input box will appear if selected text is searched.

codebing.alwaysUseDefaultForSelection.title: Always use default provider for selection search
codebing.alwaysUseDefaultForSelection.description: If this is 'true' only the default provider will be used for selection-based searches.
